Posts.EditableText:
So... This might be something wrong with me, but I'm 99% sure it's not.

When I click the 'Play' button to test any game in the online editor, it sends me to a page saying...
[code:3ha8tz3j]Server Error

500 - Internal server error.
There is a problem with the resource you are looking for, and it cannot be displayed.[/code:3ha8tz3j]
...So is this a problem with the website?
Posts.HTML:
